[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/set-webpack-public-path-plugin](./set-webpack-public-path-plugin.md) &gt; [IScriptNameAssetNameOptions](./set-webpack-public-path-plugin.iscriptnameassetnameoptions.md) &gt; [useAssetName](./set-webpack-public-path-plugin.iscriptnameassetnameoptions.useassetname.md)

## IScriptNameAssetNameOptions.useAssetName property

If set to true, use the webpack generated asset's name. This option is not compatible with andy other scriptName options.

**Signature:**

```typescript
useAssetName: true;
```
